EmailTemplate.name: Exam ineligible applicant
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - You aren't eligible to take the {!Education_History__c.Exam_Type__c} exam
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You are not eligible to take the {!Education_History__c.Exam_Type__c} exam because:
[List eligibility issues]
Send proof that you meet all the requirements by [date] to take the next exam in [Month, Year].
Questions? Need help? {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov APP007
